name: DeepSleepMeditationMindfulnessofBreathing
0:
”Alexa, open relaxing mindful breathing”
”Alexa, start relaxing mindful breathing”
”Alexa, launch relaxing mindful breathing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: relaxing mindful breathing
des:
"Mindfulness of Breathing" helps you learn how to let go of the stresses of the day. Think of it like exercising a muscle that gets stronger over time. 

In fact, "Mindfulness of Breathing", the practice of intentionally quieting or focusing the mind, creates physiological changes that are similar to those that happen in your body during the early phases of sleep. Your pulse slows, blood pressure drops and stress hormones decrease. Being able to get to that state on demand means that you’ll have an easier time drifting off when you want to. 

Note: This skill does not provide medical advice, is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment, or diagnosis.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
